column4: How can i send message with my yahoo profile instead of main id?
How can i send message with my yahoo profile instead of main id in Kopete or Pidgin?
i can help u with that
do u have ure account setup in pidgin already?
go to Accounts on the top menu
I'm logged with my main ID but i want to send message with my profile
what accounts do u have setup
e.g. my id is chairman.xi and in this id have 3 profiles added there names are chaircool.xi , chairperson.xi, chairleader.xi
is it possible for me to send message with my profile under chairman.xi ?
in windows yahoo messenger its just easy scroll down and change your yahoo profile and send message.
they all are not mine. these are example to make you understand easily
u could disable the other accounts besides the one u want
i found the fix, you have to go in id menu and click Active ID then i wrote my profile now sending msg going with my profiles
good job, ill have to remember that. i only have aim and irc on mine at this time :P
